title: Imperial Assembly announces new infrastructure program
excerpt: The Assembly has approved a multi-year plan to expand port facilities across the western territories.

title: Maid Corps conducts ceremonial parade in Xaiar capital
excerpt: The Maid Corps led a march honoring veterans and showcasing new regalia and formations.

title: Public health advisory: seasonal inoculation schedules
excerpt: Citizens are encouraged to consult regional clinics for the updated inoculation timetable.
